summary: Comprehensive end-to-end testing of Real-Time Contact Center Voice Analytics Dashboard completed successfully. Backend APIs (100% success rate) and frontend UI navigation/functionality tested thoroughly.

ui_bugs.issue: Chart width(-1) and height(-1) warnings in Analytics page charts
ui_bugs.impact: Charts may not render correctly in some viewport sizes

integration_issues.issue: WebSocket connection to '/api/ws/live' occasionally fails during initial connection
integration_issues.impact: Real-time updates may be delayed initially but connection status shows 'Connected'

passed_tests: Authentication: /api/auth/me with Bearer token works correctly
Dashboard loads with 12 active calls in call grid
Metrics bar displays: active calls (12), avg sentiment (0.03), alerts (132), longest call (1:03)
Call detail navigation with transcripts, sentiment charts, AI insights working
Supervisor actions (flag, transfer, note) functional on call details
Alerts page loads with 51 active alerts, acknowledge/resolve buttons work
Analytics page loads with all 4 charts (call volume, sentiment, issues, agent performance)
Agents page displays 8 agent cards with status and performance metrics
Settings page simulation controls work (start/stop, config sliders, scenario triggers)
All sidebar navigation links work correctly
All 21 backend API endpoints return expected responses
Database session and user authentication working properly
